pkgmetadata.longdescription: # PHUB - An API for PornHub.PHUB is an API wrapper for Pornhub (PH).It is able to communicate with most used PHfeatures such as video searching, downloading,account connection, etc.Learn more on the project [documentation](https://phub.readthedocs.io) and[github page](https://github.com/Egsagon/PHUB).## InstallationDependencies: `requests`, `click`, `tqdm````shpip install -U phub```Or, development branch:```shpip install -U git+https://github.com/Egsagon/PHUB.git````## Exemple usage```pythonimport phubclient = phub.Client()video = client.get(url = '...')video.download('my-video.mp4', quality = 'best')```
